headline.main: Strong Defenses Set Up, Reporter Finds -Three-Month Struggle That Broke Vichy Rule in 1940 Is Now Revealed

lead_paragraph: MELBOURNE, Australia, May 1 -- I was in Noumea, principal city of New Caledonia, last Saturday, the day the War Department at Washington announced that United States forces had arrived there, and I saw reassuring evidence that the islands on the strategically vital northeastern flank of Australia had been fortified strongly.
abstract: W Hipple on New Caledonia rule assumption by Free French forces; map
